Do you think that there is even a point in having political parties anymore? Do you think some people get more caught up in which party is doing what instead what what the person running for office is actually doing?
 
 Which political party do you belong to, if any, and why?

post_info.post_title: Are POLITICAL PARTIES really necessary anymore

While having multiple parties causes much argument, people need the ability to choose a party because of what they are defending and what they are against. Without the different parties, there would be no distinct difference between candidates for those people who vote only based on political party. Even though that isn't really right, it gets more votes. :D

I think parties make it easier to know what the person your voting for stands for. If I didnt have time to research each one, I would hate to think I voted for a baby-butchering democrat. Besides, the competitve edge poltical parties create encourages voter turn out.

I am registered as Independent, and I vote for the particular person and what they stand for, I do not pay attention to what party they belong to. I think if there were no political parties, people might pay more attention to the individual running for office, and what THEY plan on doing, not the general things that their party has always stood for.
That is what I was trying to say, Sakata

Sakata: I think parties make it easier to know what the person your voting for stands for. If I didnt have time to research each one, I would hate to think I voted for a baby-butchering democrat. Besides, the competitve edge poltical parties create encourages voter turn out.

 and I agree with: Besides, the competitve edge poltical parties create encourages voter turn out.

 What I don't get is why you said "baby-butchering democrat" why not a baby-butchering republican?

 I think parties are good, but you should also learn as much as you can on all candidates and choose which one you think is best. Since thats what our civics teacher said to be a "responsible voter" riiiight emoticon_rolleyes
I'm an anarchist. What can I say?
